page.title: 19Unemployment in Wigan
page.content:
Unemployment in our block is high. In a survey we carried out in our school results showed that unemployment was as high as 30%. My dad hasn't got a job but my mum has. She goes to work at 11 o'clock until l o'clock. She works as a dinner lady at St. Edward's School. When she comes home she washes and hoovers and dusts. My dad goes to the shop and makes our tea and butters some bread. After our tea we go for a game of snooker. Some- times I beat him and sometimes he beats me. Sometimes my dad takes me to my Grandad's and Grandma's to see them.
St. Mark's School.
